getReceiveMatchHash

public static int getReceiveMatchHash(AeInboundReceive aInboundReceive)
Returns the "matches" hash value of the inbound receive.

Parameters:
aInboundReceive - An inbound receive.
Returns:
The receive's hash value (with no correlation data hashed in).

getReceiveMatchHash

public static int getReceiveMatchHash(java.lang.String aOperation,
                                      java.lang.String aPartnerLinkName,
                                      javax.xml.namespace.QName aPortType)
This method returns a Hash value that gets stored in the queued receive table. This hash value is used to select potentially matching receives. Note that this hash value does not guarantee equality, but is a good starting point for quickly selecting receives that might match. A final greedy comparison is needed to fully determine equality.

Parameters:
aOperation - The receive's operation.
aPartnerLinkName - The receive's partner link name.
aPortType - The receive's port type.
Returns:
A hash value.

getReceiveCorrelatesHash

public static int getReceiveCorrelatesHash(java.util.Map aCorrelationMap)
This method returns a Hash value that gets stored in the queued receive table. This hash value is used to select potentially matching receives. Note that this hash value does not guarantee equality, but is a good starting point for quickly selecting receives that might match. A final greedy comparison is needed to fully determine equality. In addition, this hash value is only useful for finding receives with the same correlation data. The combination of this hash value and the "matches" hash value can be used to find a list of matching AND correlating receives.

Parameters:
aCorrelationMap - The correlation map for the receive.
Returns:
A hash value.
